Checkpoint- 3/20/2020 1:44am

Recently began working out, just basic racing as fast as possible to specific points in a level, i got my time down by 10 seconds, of course that was with help from my sister who kept pushing me. Today I tried running on my own 1/3 the way on my usual route I stopped due to how sore my legs were. I guess the buffs gained from having her in my party helped me out a decent bit. Completed a lot of my missing work, nearly done with math leaving 3 more subjects to defeat. I feel like my best friend is giving me mixed signals, they have said that they aren't interested in relationships yet have been acting odd towards me lately, I want to ask about it but I just can't do it. I feel much more positive than usual.

Those muffins in the kitchen look really tasty but I shouldn't eat them...

author: Jazz Art
text:
"Hard times create strong men, strong men create good times, good times create weak men, and weak men create hard times.”
-G. Michael Hopf

I am a 27 year old average man living in this world as of this writing. I am lucky to be living in the time where this game was released. But I am concerned.. We are living in the good times.. definitely. That means we are weak? With the chaos going on in this world, everybody with power wants to own it. I have a wife and planning to have a kid in a few years. But what will my child look forward to? what if the world will suddenly be in chaos for real this time? I'm trying to be optimistic all the time and work my ass off for a better future for my family, but the thought of sudden chaos can't leave my mind. My paranoia goes stronger every time it crosses my mind. 

This era of the game really translates the quote above very well. Everything was nearly perfect then everything fell from the sky. One of the main reason was greed. It could happen to us. and I just hope it won't. This song reminds me of that. It's beautiful yet mysterious.. I don't know what Mitsuda was thinking when he composed this but he did it and it's beautiful. I hope whoever would read this, live your life to the fullest everyday like it's your last and just be happy, help those who in need and don't step on others. And if ever chaos envelopes the world for real, like the WLF said: 
"May your survival be long and your death be swift" Long life and no pain.

author: Mikkiz666
text:
Cheekpoint:





Had a girlfriend for 8 months and we were offered full time jobs in another town, we both moved and lived in the new town for roughly over a year and everything seemed fine, the occasional fight here and there but we always went to sleep after saying we loved each other. I had a few old friends in this new town and we mainly hung around them until my girlfriend found a new friend group.

At first I was happy she was finally finding more people she could relate to, so we started hanging out less together which was fine because we always ending up sleeping together every night. She was more of a outgoing party person and I was more of a stay at home party kinda person. So she would go to the clubs almost every week and I would go every month or so. This went on for about 5 months until she was invited to a drink up I couldn't attend because of work. It was weird to sleep alone that night we said our 'I love you's but little did I know that would be the start of sleeping alone for a long time. 

She didn't cheat on me that night but she stayed distant with me, replying less and less frequent but she was always active. The next night she still hadn't left the house she was at the night before and says that she is drinking again tonight and that she wont make it home. I had a flat out day at work and didn't have the energy to go out to the house and join her. I later found out that she cheated on me that night. 

She told me that she didn't love me anymore and that she wants to move on. 2 weeks prior to all this I had purchased a ring and asked her dad for his blessing. To say I was devastated is a right understatement. I cannot explain the pain I felt through my veins, I sat in my room wondering where I went wrong all night. I vomited many times because I knew this was the end of being happy in this town. We moved down here together and made our house a home but I felt like I was in a strangers house. I was lost on what to do next in my life.

I had 2 weeks off of work because I had no motivation to live, went back to my home town to spend time with friends and family to find that happiness I once had. it was during this time my mum was diagnosed with dementia. My life was taking a big turn, everything that was making me happy was slowly leaving me. It's almost impossible for my mum to make new memories now and she pretty much only remembers old memories. So occasionally she will mention when my girlfriend was coming over (because my mum loved her)and every time I broke down crying, most of the time she didn't understand.

My 2 weeks were over in a flash. I didn't want to go back to work but I had to so I could stay afloat. I moved in with my work mate who was training me at the time and helped me alot with this breakup. My first day back on the job I get a collapsed lung out of no where. I had to undergo immediate sugary and be hospitalised for 2 weeks. My parents were the only ones who visited me in hospital for the whole 2 weeks. I was so lonely I wish I hadn't survived.

About 1 month after leaving the hospital my work mate comes home from work about 5 hours early to say he has lost his job because he was stealing. He was the only person helping me strive at work and it shocked me knowing he has been stealing all this time. He left town a week after this and work and personal life were just not fun. Long hours doing night shift just to come home to an empty house, where I just have me, myself and I to hang out with. 

A whole year goes by of autopilot, no new love, no new friends. Just work, game, sleep. My landlords tell me that the owners are looking at selling the house so I have to find a place soon to live or I won't be able to live anywhere. I've only just been scraping by with funds because of the furniture my ex and me brought brand new on my credit card and the fact I was paying double the normal rent. I don't have much free time working 60+ hours 5 days a week and getting paid only 40, so I had only a small amount of time to find a house to move into to. Well my car decided to break during this time. I was at an all time low, I didn't know what to do. 

I felt like I just wanted to get away from everything and everyone and give up on life. I handed in my resignation and ran home. That happened in March and here I am still unsure on what to do as I still feel lost without a way. I am sleepless most nights thinking of what I can do to have a life but right now I can't find it. I'm only 24 and I feel like there isn't much left for me to see. I've seen evil almost everywhere I turn and I am afraid to meet new people again. I just want to feel what it's like to be loved again.

Game Saved
JL 20/8/20 3:12am AUS

author: Wandering Internet NPC
text: [19/6/2020] Greetings travelers, strange and familiar, the passing ticking clock of the cycles of the days have come to a momentary stop, the gates of the clouds have opened up and the fast plummeting rain has fallen upon the village. Despite no wanderer steps a foot inside the great towering forests the trees shift in the soft inviting wind of hope, a beacon of home in the distance as the towering mountains part to reveal the looming mist. I have been traveling on my own quest, a quest for simple gains. And I may have found my momentary rest here but after leaving this I shall depart once more, good luck travelers on your slow tiresome quests, may the reward be bountiful and prosperous to you and your fellows.

author: OPALpersonal
text:
This is it. You've seen it all. Pewdiepie has left for his expedition of real life. Markiplier currently embarks on his journey with Ethan. You know they'll all be fine. 

Onision is dead and buried, James Charles remains on a shaky throne over cracked support... You've experienced a lifetime of Youtube drama, but you've also experienced the best of times. ASDF Movie, The good Youtube Rewinds, Jacksfilm's YGS 100, it's all under your belt. You've been a true pioneer, a veritable adventurer throughout the Youtube scape. 

From Vaporwave, to Game Grumps compilations. From entire readings of the Bee Movie script, to GMod mashup memes.

And this is your reward.

You stand at the end. The edge of the system. For beyond here, there is nothing. Nothing but that endless sky, forever out of reach from this rocky oasis which you built for yourself, using your recommended videos and subscribed feed. A peaceful, yet melancholy tune accompanies the void between the realm of content, and the realm of the unknown that stands just inches away. You stand here, on the ground, looking out into what else could be.

You contemplate. Would it be worth it to jump off? To run off the edge of the cliff and leap into the abyss, hoping that you would not fall, but fly? Or are you content to turn back into the familiar territory, and return to the Guitar Hero Memes and Vinesauce monthlies, the Relaxing Video Game Music mixtapes and perfect game speedruns?

Perhaps, just maybe, it's alright to stay here for a moment. Or for a little while.

To listen to the music, and look outside at what could be , just beyond your realm.

At the edge of the internet.




~You found: Edge 3.5/4~

子供の頃から何百回何千回と聞いてるのに、今でも全然聞き飽きない

author: Superman Zephyros
text:
やっぱゲームって基本はエンタメだから、
メーカーさんに必要なのはPCやゲームの知識じゃなくて、
『遊びを提供するセンス』なんだと思うよ。

最近アプリのクロノトリガーをプレイしたけど、やっぱりすごく面白かった。
でも操作性は最悪で、移植としては失敗だと思った。

最新の技術を有しているはずの人達がやったことは、ただ名作を汚しただけ。
それってやっぱ『遊びを提供するセンス』が無いからだよね。
遊ぶ人のことをあまり考えてないと思うんだ。

据え置き型よりも、スマホや携帯ゲームの方に熱があるのもそういうことなんじゃないかな。
ユーザーにとってはいかに楽しく遊ばせてもらえるかの方が大事なんだよね。

text: cdr412 20年も前なんですね！知りませんでした……僕はお兄ちゃんがファミコン世代なのでクロノトリガーが家にあって幼稚園からやっていて、15歳になりましたが今でも3ヶ月にに1回は必ずやりたくなります！幼稚園の時から今まで大量のゲームをやって来ましたが、今でもこのゲームは1番素晴らしいと思います。残念なのはやっぱり年月が経つにつれてだんだんやる人が少なくなるんですよね……それをとても残念に思います……このゲームは全体的に素晴らしいと思いますが、個人的に一番好きなのはやっぱりBGMですよね！一度でいいのでやったことない人はクロノトリガーをやってみて欲しいですよね！でもゲーム自体は生産終了したりしてるので、やる人が減っていく一方なんですよね……そのことが一番残念です……まだまだ書くことはありますが、とても長くなりそうなのでこれぐらいにしておきます。長文失礼致しましたm(｡>__<｡)m

クロノトリガー自体が凄く完成度の高いゲームで、使われている曲もどれも素晴らしく、印象に残る物ばかりですよね。
やはり他のゲームとは一味違うな～と思います。

author: Fo4ts
text:
主旋律のシタールはどこか尖った金属的な弦楽器で、それが科学文明の粋を集めた魔法王国ジールを彷彿させます。幾重にも耳の奥にリバウンドしてくるどこか温かみのある木琴がベースとなりシタールを支えている。どちらもとても古い楽器です。
遠い昔、儚く海に没した古代都市。美しく華やかに栄えたジールとは一体どんな国だったんでしょうね。。

text:
変な場所にワープしたと思って外に出てみたら、、、
荒廃した世界に吹雪、しかもフィールドの音楽が、
「ゴワァァァァァン・・・・・・・・」
音楽と言うか異音。出て来る敵は不気味なミュータントばかり、、、。
そこを耐えて耐えて、、、ようやく次のステージに辿り着いてみると、、、
そこは幻想的な古代都市。これは涙腺レッドカードです。

author: taia777
text:
背景をそれぞれレイヤーごとに分けて、aviutlというソフトで編集してます。
雲の部分は、小さな画像を繰り返し貼って、横に流してます。
島の部分は、水の動きを動画に撮り、静止画の上に乗せてます。
それぞれのレイヤーに動的なノイズを少々乗せており、
島の部分は質感を出すため強めのノイズを乗せてます。
後は明るさなど色々と調節してます。

author: Lavos

author: Jacob Finn
text: English: "The background is divided into layers and edited with aviutl software.  The cloud is a small image repeatedly pasted and shed next to it.  The part of the island takes a video of the movement of the water and puts it on a still image.  Each layer is loaded with a bit of dynamic noise, and the island is loaded with stronger noise to get a texture.  After that I adjust various things such as brightness."

author: Alejandro CH
text: @Neilsares Enaif  No es así, se extrae los Recursos directamente del ROM del juego, si tanto explicas tu pendejada porque no subes tu unos videos asi?

author: Neilsares Enaif
text:
@Chief  El fondo se divide en capas y se edita con un software llamado aviutl.
El área de la nube es una imagen pequeña pegada repetidamente y que se desprende horizontalmente.
En la isla, el movimiento del agua se captura en un vídeo y se coloca en una imagen fija.
Se pone un poco de ruido dinámico en cada capa,
En la parte de la isla, pongo un fuerte ruido para dar una textura.
El resto se ajusta de varias maneras, como el brillo.
